pages.text: The Pink Kush Strain$(br2)Base THC: 19% $(br)Base CBD: 6% $(br)Effect: Regeneration
Pink Kush Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Pink Kush Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Pink Kush Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Pink Kush Weed in an Extractor
You can package your pink kush weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
